PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-15292011-12-08EC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Environmental Emergency Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the ENVIRONMENTAL EMERGENCY REGULATIONS in order to require that effective environmental emergency plans are in place to protect the environment and the health of Canadians by preventing, preparing for, responding to and recovering from an environmental emergency.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0294 Publication Date: 2011-12-21
